title: What are rare earths and critical minerals – explained in 30 seconds
summary: Rare earths are essential critical minerals vital for defense, automotive, and electronics sectors. Their strategic importance has intensified tensions in diplomatic relations and global trade. As demand rises, nations are vying for control over these resources.

title: ‘Wailing ghosts through loudspeakers’: Cambodia accuses Thailand of psychological warfare along border
summary: Cambodia’s rights commission has warned that "intense, high-pitched noises" emitted by Thai soldiers near the disputed border could escalate tensions between the two countries. The commission expressed concerns about the potential for increased conflict resulting from these broadcasts. Diplomatic relations may be strained as Cambodia reacts to this provocative action.

title: Australia Post incorrectly charged tariffs on items ordered online being returned to the US
summary: Trump tariffs will not be imposed on returned goods that were originally manufactured in the United States. This policy aims to support domestic manufacturers by exempting certain returned items from tariff regulations. The clarification ensures that U.S. businesses can effectively manage their inventory without facing additional costs.
